**It includes the following functional areas:**

## üí¨ All

Displays all messages ‚Äî both past and recent ‚Äî providing a complete historical view of activity.


::div{class="flex  w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-70  py-4"}

:iframe{src="/all_fte.png" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-auto"  frameborder="0"  scrolling="no"}

::

## üßæ Nofie

Filters and shows only the messages where the user has been directly notified, helping highlight important interactions without distractions.

::div{class="flex  w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-70  py-4"}

:iframe{src="/nofie.png" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-auto"  frameborder="0"  scrolling="no"}

::

## üìå Pinned

Collects all messages the user has pinned, offering fast access to content marked as relevant or reference-worthy.

::div{class="flex  w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-70  py-4"}

:iframe{src="/pin.png" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-auto"  frameborder="0"  scrolling="no"}

::

## üîç Open Search 

A built-in search tool that allows users to quickly find specific messages using keywords, improving navigation and information retrieval.


::div{class="flex  w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-70  py-4"}

:iframe{src="/search.png" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-auto"  frameborder="0"  scrolling="no"}

::

### üí° Tips

* Use Pinned to save messages you'll need later. It keeps your workspace clean and focused.

* Try the Search Bar for quick filtering instead of scrolling through long threads.

* Switch to Nofie when you only want to see messages that require your attention.

::div{class="flex justify-between items-center border-t py-4 mt-10"}
